mapper.insert: insert into board(bo_st_num, bo_title, bo_content, bo_me_id, bo_reg_date) values(#{board.bo_st_num}, #{board.bo_title}, #{board.bo_content}, #{board.bo_me_id}, NOW())
mapper.select: select * from board join member on bo_me_id = me_id where bo_num = #{bo_num}
mapper.update: update board set bo_views = bo_views+1 where bo_num = #{bo_num}
